Text: Todule̩ amo̩maye, nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩, tod ejumomi-wa kʼO̩jo̩ li, ame̩ ki mʼaño̩la-me̩ kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ki deju kʼi afo̩ kʼi nyʼo̩ eju, ucholo ku me̩ nʼibe ache de̩.

Me̩ ki che ku me̩ dab abo o̩kpanachi-i eju one̩ n, ama ibe-me̩ ki dʼetito̩ alo waa kʼi rʼume̩ da ojoji, kʼame̩ ki nañwa e̩wñ ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩, kʼi nyo̩ kʼi ño̩ nyo̩ eju, kʼi la mufu kpa, go ka kʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ i che.

Todu naka ñw e̩ne̩ du ki dʼef ume̩ lef ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ku ma du ñwu mi, ka kʼi we edʼo̩la-wñ rʼone̩ tʼalu ki chʼukpe̩ ibe-wñ le̩, ibe e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki muda chʼibe ki wane̩, teju alu kʼO̩jo̩ fʼe̩ñwa e̩do̩ ekono kpe̩ ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩.
Todu alu kʼawa chenʼe̩wñ año̩la wewe ef año̩laʼka, kʼuko̩lo̩ kʼe̩wñ año̩la wewe le̩ nʼache ma chʼokate n,
abe̩le̩ awa kʼa chʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ chʼaño̩laʼka efu Kraisti, okoke-wa la chʼe̩wñ año̩la omune̩.
Abu kʼa la nʼele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ojoji ojoji teju alu kʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ku ma du ñw a de̩, dagba i chʼache̩-eka, ache̩-eka-wa ki chʼeju e̩do̩ ekono-wa;
abe̩k i chʼe̩wñ eche ñw one̩, kʼa najʼef e̩wñ eche ñw one̩ alo waa; abe̩k i chʼe̩ne̩ ki akone̩wñ, kʼi nadʼef e̩wñ ekone̩ alo waa;

abe̩k i chʼe̩ne̩ ki adʼugbe̩do̩ ñw one̩, kʼi nadʼef ugbe̩do̩ edu ñw one̩ alo waa; e̩ne̩ ki akpʼe̩wñ kpʼone̩, kʼi nache kpai e̩do̩-wawa; e̩ne̩ ki tʼo̩gba, kʼi nache ef e̩do̩chacha; e̩ne̩ ki ali ejumomi one̩, kʼi nache kpai e̩do̩ afu.
Ufe̩do̩-me̩ ki nʼako̩ru n; e̩wñ bibi ki nachʼe̩wñ o̩lajijili ñwu me̩; me̩ nalamʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩.
I chʼeche̩do̩ amo̩maye, me̩ ki che̩do̩ omune̩ dabe̩ne̩ ku me̩ chʼefu; i chʼebumʼone̩, me̩ ki dʼomune̩ tʼo̩gba.
I chʼe-e̩do̩ chacha, me̩ ki chʼo̩kpo̩ n; afu ki kpuna ef e̩do̩-me̩, me̩ nachuko̩lo̩ adu ñw Ondu;
me̩ nayo̩ ef ibe ekono; me̩ nafe̩do̩ lichi ef o̩bata; me̩ gwo̩nyʼadua eche alo waa;
me̩ natuta kpai abo kiafo̩ ef eku e̩wñ ki aku ma; me̩ nabʼojo eche kpe̩re̩;
me̩ nakadua ñwabo ku ma doli me̩; me̩ kadua, me̩ ki nama n.
Me̩ nabʼabo ku ma yo̩ yo̩; me̩ nabʼabo ku ma raku raku.
Ibe-me̩ ki chʼokate kpai omune̩. Ibe-me̩ ki tʼe̩wñ ogbemede n, me̩ ki muda leb abo ku ma hi o̩la-ma wane̩. Me̩ ki mud amanibe eju o̩la-me̩ n.
Me̩ ki dʼe̩bie̩ne̩ koji e̩bie̩ne̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du n. Me̩ fʼibe wñ kpe̩ tane̩ kʼe̩wñ-me̩ chaka ki chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ eju amone̩ du.
Iche̩wñ kʼi jʼache i bo̩ te̩ ñw e-me̩, ure̩do̩ ki dʼagbagba me̩ kpai amone̩ du.
Abo ufe̩do̩, me̩ ki nache̩ o̩la-me̩ n, me̩ ki la bʼuña te̩ ñw uwe̩do̩; todu i che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini, Ondu kakini, Ache̩ ena chʼe-mi, omi anakoji.
I muda che̩wñ kʼebi akpa e̩nebi-we̩, e̩ ñwʼo̩ o̩je̩ kʼi je̩; alugbe̩ akpʼo, dʼomi ñw u ñmo̩; todu e̩ che-i, mak e̩ge̩-una uwe̩ agbanyʼo oji le̩.
E̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩bie̩ne̩ fʼe̩ du n, e̩ ki muda nʼe̩nyo̩ fʼe̩bie̩ne̩ du.
